CustomField.formula: IF( contains($Label.ManagerId,CASESAFEID( IF( NOT(isManager__c), IF( NOT(ISBLANK(SBQQ__SalesRep__r.ManagerId)), IF( NOT(ISBLANK(SBQQ__SalesRep__r.Manager.ManagerId)), IF( NOT(ISBLANK(SBQQ__SalesRep__r.Manager.Manager.ManagerId)) && NOT(CONTAINS(SBQQ__SalesRep__r.Manager.Manager.Manager.UserRole.Name, "EVP")), SBQQ__SalesRep__r.Manager.Manager.Manager.ManagerId, "" ), "" ), "" ), IF( NOT(ISBLANK(SBQQ__SalesRep__r.ManagerId)), IF( NOT(ISBLANK(SBQQ__SalesRep__r.Manager.ManagerId)), SBQQ__SalesRep__r.Manager.Manager.ManagerId, "" ), "" ) ) )), Manager_3__c, IF( NOT(isManager__c), IF( NOT(ISBLANK(SBQQ__SalesRep__r.ManagerId)), IF( NOT(ISBLANK(SBQQ__SalesRep__r.Manager.ManagerId)), IF( NOT(ISBLANK(SBQQ__SalesRep__r.Manager.Manager.ManagerId)) && NOT(CONTAINS(SBQQ__SalesRep__r.Manager.Manager.Manager.UserRole.Name, "EVP")), SBQQ__SalesRep__r.Manager.Manager.Manager.ManagerId, "" ), "" ), "" ), IF( NOT(ISBLANK(SBQQ__SalesRep__r.ManagerId)), IF( NOT(ISBLANK(SBQQ__SalesRep__r.Manager.ManagerId)), SBQQ__SalesRep__r.Manager.Manager.ManagerId, "" ), "" ) ) )
CustomField.label: Manager 4
